languages.text: Даргонус — просвещенный мир, там будет развернут секретный либрариум, в котором знатоки тайного смогут обменяться сведениями и прикоснуться к запретному.
Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.
languages.original_text: Даргонус — просвещенный мир, там будет развернут секретный либрариум, в котором знатоки тайного смогут обменяться сведениями и прикоснуться к запретному.

traits.locale_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.
A new entry in the annals of Dargonus — the foundation of a vast repository of secrets and knowledge. Only the aristocracy and the highest ranks will have access to its halls.
Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.
A new entry in the annals of Dargonus — the foundation of a vast repository of secrets and knowledge. Only the aristocracy and the highest ranks will have access to its halls.
Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.
Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.
Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.

languages.text: Dargonus, un monde éduqué, est l'endroit idéal où établir une bibliothèque secrète dans laquelle les érudits de l'occulte seront libres de partager leurs connaissances et de se risquer dans l'interdit.
languages.original_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus, un monde éduqué, est l'endroit idéal où établir une bibliothèque secrète dans laquelle les érudits de l'occulte seront libres de partager leurs connaissances et de se risquer dans l'interdit.

languages.text: ダルゴナスは教養のある世界で、難解な知識を持つ学者が自由に知識を共有し、禁断の世界に踏み込むことができる場所だ。秘密の図書館を設立するのにはふさわしい。
languages.original_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスは教養のある世界で、難解な知識を持つ学者が自由に知識を共有し、禁断の世界に踏み込むことができる場所だ。秘密の図書館を設立するのにはふさわしい。

languages.text: 既然达戈努斯的公民都受过教育，那在这里建造秘密图书馆真是再合适不过了。研究秘法的学者们可以自由地分享他们的知识，深入研究禁忌之物。
languages.original_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.

traits.locale_text: 既然达戈努斯的公民都受过教育，那在这里建造秘密图书馆真是再合适不过了。研究秘法的学者们可以自由地分享他们的知识，深入研究禁忌之物。

languages.text: Puesto que Dargonus es un mundo educado, es el lugar idóneo para instalar un bibliotecarium donde los eruditos de lo arcano puedan compartir conocimientos y profundizar en asuntos prohibidos.
languages.original_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.

traits.locale_text: Puesto que Dargonus es un mundo educado, es el lugar idóneo para instalar un librarium donde los eruditos de lo arcano puedan compartir conocimientos y profundizar en asuntos prohibidos.

languages.text: Dargonus ist eine gebildete Welt und damit der richtige Ort, um ein geheimes Librarium zu errichten, in dem Gelehrte des Arkanen ihr Wissen teilen und das Verbotene erkunden können.
languages.original_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus ist eine gebildete Welt und damit der richtige Ort, um ein geheimes Librarium zu errichten, in dem Gelehrte des Arkanen ihr Wissen teilen und das Verbotene erkunden können.

languages.text: Dargonus eğitimli bir dünya olduğundan mütevellit gizli bir libraryum için makul olacaktır. Arkana bilginleri burada irfanlarını paylaşıp yasaklı ilimleri araştıracaklar.
languages.original_text: Since Dargonus is an educated world, it is the right place to establish a secret librarium where scholars of the arcane will be free to share their knowledge and delve into the forbidden.
